Bio

I am originally from Biratnagar, Nepal. I completed my B.E in Computer Engineering at Tribhuwan University, Institue of Engineering, Pulchowk. I joined the College of William & Mary as a PhD student on the Fall of 2017. I have since been working at the Secure Platforms Lab (SPL) with Prof. Adwait Nadkarni to analyze and identify current security issues in smart home platforms. My free time generally sees me enjoying an audio book or hiking.
